contexts.context: An endeavor has recently been made to <mark>improve</mark> these treaties with Spain, the Netherlands, and...
..., the Netherlands, and Portugal; but no <mark>improvement</mark> of the measures to be carried into execution under...
...to the legislature, that the Law might be <mark>improved</mark>, and its severities against Persons engaged in carrying...
...carrying on the Slave Trade be encreased. Those <mark>improvements</mark> might be first, to make the proof of...
...a Military Despotism than to conduct them to any <mark>improved</mark> System of regular Liberty.
